alert.note: Alert for Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Maui, Upcountry (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 12:06AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT MAUI IN MAUI COUNTY THROUGH 130 AM HST... At 1205 AM HST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 5 miles east of Pukoo to 20 miles south of Manele. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kahului, Kihei, Lahaina, Kapalua, Honokohau, Kahakuloa, Puunene, Waikapu, Wailuku, Waiehu, Maalaea, Waihee, Kaanapali, Napili-Honokowai, Olowalu, Kanaha Beach Park, Honolua Bay, Ukumehame Beach Park, and Launiupoko. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
